abstract_summ: The virus severe acute respiratory syndrome–coronavirus 2 (SARS-CoV-2) can cause coronavirus disease 2019 (COVID-19), an influenza-like disease that is primarily thought to infect the lungs with transmission via the respiratory route . Here, we report productive infection of SARS-coV2 in ACE2+ mature enterocytes in human small intestinal enteroids . We also demonstrate that viruses released into the intestinal lumen were inactivated by simulated human colonic fluid .
